name: REM: Digital Dreams
description:
A dreamlike exploration game where you play as an alien who has been mysteriously dropped into an unknown world, and you have to find your way out.

If you run into any issues, please let me know. This is my first serious game project so don't expect it to be amazing, but regardless I am still proud of what I created so far.

I will be updating this occasionally to add new locations, features and fix bugs.
